content: Chainswitch - $SWITCHCross-Chain DEX AggregatorWelcome to a world where cross-chain trading is seamless, secure, and efficient. Introducing Chainswitch, the ultimate cross-chain DEX aggregating protocol that unlocks unlimited trading possibilities.Chainswitch enables you to swiftly swap across multiple blockchains without relying on intermediary bridges, chains, or assets, taking your trading experience to new heights. With support for over 20+ blockchains, 40+ DEXs, and more than 20,000 crypto assets, the possibilities are endless.Leveraging cutting-edge technology, Chainswitch offers valuable insights into contract details like taxes, max transactions, wallet limits, and malicious codes, ensuring a secure trading environment for users.Not only does Chainswitch revolutionize trading, but it also presents the $SWITCH token ‚Äì your key to cross-chain trading and earning rewards. By staking $SWITCH in secure pools, you can enjoy high APR with minimal risk, reaping the benefits of this next-generation platform.Embrace the future of trading with Chainswitch, available on our app or website, and connect with our growing community on Telegram and Twitter.Chainswitch ‚Äì the future of cross-chain trading starts now.--- Contract Audit : https://github.com/CFG-NINJA/audits/blob/4b24aa627ac7b57ea66d6cbd7bf2ad3699358dd3/20230602_CFGNINJA_Chainswitch_SWITCH_Audit.pdf--- Dapp : https://app.chainswitch.org/--- Chart : https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0x7ab15fec060866330ade4b76e5f24222fc830622SOCIALS :üåü Website: https://chainswitch.org/üì≤ Telegram: @ Chainswitchüê¶ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Chainswitch#ChainSwitch #Cryptocurrency #Blockchain #DecentralizedFinance #CryptoRevolution[/b]
